item.description:
Further discussion on marketing materials for use at events around the state.

Share any copy that has been written since our first meeting for brochure topics that we are starting with:

1. Taxes-Bailouts-Tarp
2. Inflation-Federal Reserve
3. Healthcare
4. Social Security -Unfunded liabilities $51 trillion
5. Safety of Your Personal Information - Gov't databases - Martial Law stages

The brochures will state the subject grievences with bullet points and alternative solution bullets. or grievences and bills that caused the grievences.

Brochures are to inform but relate heavily to You (the individual(s) who read(s) them).

First meeting attended by Jim A, Jim P., Rick Aiello, barbara g.
item.name: CT Marketing Meeting #2
